full_summary:
# Cancelled Tender: AR22SLGA
===========================

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01015839
**Solicitation Number**: AR22SLGA
**Publishing Date**: 2022-12-06
**Tender Closing Date**: *Cancelled*

## About this Notice

This notice pertains to a previously published request for information (RFI) for the procurement of construction services, solicitation AR22SLGA. However, due to unforeseen circumstances, this tender has been cancelled.

## Contract Description

The original procurement sought contractors with expertise in various construction services, including:

* Construction of One and Two Dwelling Buildings
* Construction of Multi-Dwelling Buildings
* Construction of Warehouses and Industrial Buildings
* Construction of Commercial Buildings
* Construction of Health Buildings
* Construction of Other Buildings
* Construction Services, Not Elsewhere Specified
* General Heavy Construction
* Prefabricated Constructions, Supply and Erection
* Other Special Trade Construction Work

## Procurement Details

The procurement was to be conducted through a competitive, open bidding process, adhering to the principles of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

## Tender Status

The tender has been cancelled, and no further action is required.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or concerns, please contact:

Smith, Mark
mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
(613) 859-0549

The tender was published by Defence Construction Canada, a government entity responsible for carrying out construction projects on behalf of the Canadian government. ## Acknowledgement

The publisher acknowledges the error in the tender process and appreciates the understanding and cooperation of all stakeholders involved. Please direct any questions or concerns regarding this cancellation to the contact person listed above.
